name: lcov

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-capture-tiny
dependencies.description: Capture STDOUT and STDERR from Perl, XS or external programs

dependencies.name: perl-devel-cover
dependencies.description: Devel::Cover - Perl extension for code coverage metrics

dependencies.name: perl-datetime
dependencies.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependencies.name: perl-digest-md5
dependencies.description: Perl interface to the MD5 Algorithm

dependencies.name: perl-file-spec
dependencies.description:
File::Spec - Perl extension for portably performing operations on file
names

dependencies.name: perl-memory-process
dependencies.description: Memory::Process - Perl class to determine actual memory usage

dependencies.name: perl-time-hires
dependencies.description: High resolution alarm, sleep, gettimeofday, interval timers

dependent_to.name: n2p2
dependent_to.description:
N2p2 (The neural network potential package) provides ready-to-use
software for high-dimensional neural network potentials in computational
physics and chemistry.
